abilities.text: Any damage done by attacks to a Burned Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is increased by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). No more than 40 damage can be added by all Burning Spirit Poké-Bodies.

abilities.name: Shuffle
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Unown and switch it with Unown. (Any cards attached to Unown, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Unown on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Shuffle Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Hidden Power

data.name: Copycat
rules: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, count the number of cards in your opponent's hand and draw that many cards.

You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Professor's Letter
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Fire Cube 01
rules: Attach this card to 1 of your Fire Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card's attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Fire Cube 01.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Professor Kukui
rules: Draw 2 cards. During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Ursaring

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

data.flavorText: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.

data.name: Pikipek
data.flavorText: It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times per second!

attacks.name: Healing Dust
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. If a Pokémon has fewer damage counters than the number of heads, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Miracle Powder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Condition (Asleep, Burned, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned). The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

data.name: Flabébé

attacks.name: Petal Blizzard
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It's not safe without the power of a flower, but it will keep traveling around until it finds one with the color and shape it wants.

data.name: Steven's Resolve
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Make Do

attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

attacks.name: Aurora Gain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.

rules: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.

data.flavorText: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damage by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

attacks.name: Defog

data.name: Forest Guardian
rules: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Shuffle your deck. Then, look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Choose 1 of those cards and put it into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck afterward.

data.name: Floette

abilities.name: Flower Picking
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may choose 2 random cards from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals those cards and shuffles them into their deck.

data.flavorText: It raises flowers and uses them as weapons. The more gorgeous the blossom, the more power it contains.

data.name: Trumbeak

abilities.name: Charging Trumpet
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and attach any number of basic Energy cards you find there to your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

data.flavorText: From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise to new plants.

data.name: Master Ball
rules: Look at 7 cards from the top of your deck. You may choose a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card from those cards, show it your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

attacks.name: Discerning Spear
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has no damage counters on it before this attack does damage, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

data.name: Cutiefly

attacks.name: Sweet Scent
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Myriads of Cutiefly flutter above the heads of people who have auras resembling those of flowers.

data.flavorText: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

data.flavorText: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

data.name: Oranguru

abilities.name: Primate Wisdom
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may switch a card from your hand with the top card of your deck.

data.flavorText: It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will gather medicinal herbs to treat it.

data.name: Wondrous Labyrinth ◇
rules: The attacks of non-Fairy Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) cost Colorless more.
Whenever any player plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Stadium card.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.
